+package net.runelite.client.plugins.menuentryswapper;
+
+import lombok.Getter;
+import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
+
+@Getter
+@RequiredArgsConstructor
+public enum SellMode
+{
+	OFF("Off"),
+	SELL_1("Sell 1"),
+	SELL_5("Sell 5"),
+	SELL_10("Sell 10"),
+	SELL_50("Sell 50");
+
+	private final String name;
+
+	@Override
+	public String toString()
+	{
+		return name;
+	}

beforeCommit.message: Changes the buy/sell swap to be item-specific to prevent accidental buying/selling of items. Now, swaps are enabled by shift-rightclicking an item in a shop, or an item in your inventory while the shop interface is open. Also adds a config to enable/disable this (defaults to enabled) so that people will know that this feature exists and how to use it.

afterCommit.message: Changes the buy/sell swap to be item-specific to prevent accidental buying/selling of items. Now, swaps are enabled by shift-rightclicking an item in a shop, or an item in your inventory while the shop interface is open. Also adds a config to enable/disable this (defaults to enabled) so that people will know that this feature exists and how to use it.

beforeCommit.message: Changes the buy/sell swap to be item-specific to prevent accidental buying/selling of items. Now, swaps are enabled by shift-rightclicking an item in a shop, or an item in your inventory while the shop interface is open. Also adds a config to enable/disable this (defaults to enabled) so that people will know that this feature exists and how to use it.

afterCommit.message: Changes the swap to only happen when shift is held, to prevent accidental buying/selling.

commit.message: Adds menu entry swaps for Buy 1/5/10/50 and Sell 1/5/10/50 options when trading with shops.
